saveImage

public static void saveImage(RenderedImage image,
                             String formatName,
                             File file)
                      throws IOException
Save the given Image in the file system.

Parameters:
image - The image to save.
formatName - The saved image file format name (png, jpeg ...).
file - The file to save the image in.
Throws:
IOException - If an exception occurs while saving the image.
